data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bezděk, Jan, Beenen, Ron (2009): Additions to the description of Yunnaniata konstantinovi Lopatin, 2009, and its classification in the section Capulites (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae: Hylaspini). Zootaxa 2303: 45-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191775
